career.title: Frontend Developer
career.shortDescription: Seeking a skilled Frontend Developer to create responsive, user-friendly interfaces. Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript required. Join our dynamic team!
career.jobDescription:
*Apply only if you have a strong hands-on practice with modern frontend technologies.

Company Overview:

xScientist is a dynamic software and game development company based in India. Our primary missionis to empowerentrepreneurs, engineers, and scientists to transform their innovative ideas into reality. Wespecialize inleveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver top-notch products and solutions. With a dedicatedteam ofprofessionals, we offer a collaborative platform for individuals worldwide to participate in rapidproductdevelopment. At xScientist, we are committed to excellence, utilizing the latest methodologies to ensureoptimalresults for our clients.

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain responsive web applications using modern frontend frameworks such asReact.js or Vue.js.
  • Collaborate with designers and backend developers to implement and integrate user-facingelements withserver-sidelogic.
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
  • Stay updated on emerging frontend technologies and best practices.

Requirements:

  • Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Experience with modern frontend frameworks/libraries such as React.js, Vue.js, Angular, etc.
  • Familiarity with state management libraries such as Redux or Vuex.
  • Understanding of RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
  • Knowledge of responsivedesign principles and cross-browser compatibility issues.
  • Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (preferred but not required).

Mode of Work:

  • Preference will be given to candidates willing to work on-site, but exceptional remote candidates with astrongFrontend background will be considered.

Hiring Process:

  • Technical Assessment
  • Technical Interview
  • HR Interview
  • Discussion with Founders

Role Out:

  • Upon successful completion of the interview process, selected candidates will be offered a paidinternshipfor thefirst month. Based on performance evaluation during the internship period, a full-timeemployment offer willbeextended.

Benefits:

  • Opportunity to work with a diverse tech stack in a core data science startup environment.
  • Stakeholder benefits in our in-house projects.
  • Rapid career advancement and salary hikes based on performance.

Join us at xScientist and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to pushing the boundaries oftechnology andinnovation!

career.title: Backend Developer
career.shortDescription: Hiring Backend Developer to architect and implement server-side logic, databases, and APIs. Proficiency in programming languages like Python, Java, or Node.js essential. Join us!
career.jobDescription:
*Apply only if you have a strong hands-on practice with Django.

Company Overview:

xScientist is a dynamic software and game development company based in India. Our primary mission is to empowerentrepreneurs, engineers, and scientists to transform their innovative ideas into reality. We specialize inleveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver top-notch products and solutions. With a dedicated team ofprofessionals, we offer a collaborative platform for individuals worldwide to participate in rapid productdevelopment. At xScientist, we are committed to excellence, utilizing the latest methodologies to ensure optimalresults for our clients.

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Assume full ownership of projects and features developed in-house.
  • Thoroughly understand client requirements and ensure accurate implementation.
  • Engage in multitasking to manage various project aspects effectively.
  • Demonstrate unwavering dedication to assigned tasks.

Requirements:

  • Proficiency in Django & Django Rest Framework with proven project experience.
  • Strong understanding of API and REST API development, including designing, building, and consuming APIs.
  • Thorough understanding of Django models and ORM queries, with the ability to optimize database performanceand execute complex queries.
  • Comprehensive knowledge of MySQL and PostgreSQL connections with Django, along with proficiency in SQLqueries and database management.
  • Proficiency in Django function-based and class-based views, URL routers, serializers, and other keycomponents of the Django framework.
  • Experience with version control systems, particularly Git, and familiarity with GitHub CI/CD processes.
  • Experience with Selenium/Beautiful Soup for web scraping.
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively within a team.
  • Flexibility to adapt to evolving project requirements.
  • Preference will be given to candidates with on-site availability, although exceptional remote candidateswith extensive Django experience will be considered.

Mode of Work:

  • Preference will be given to candidates willing to work on-site, but exceptional remote candidates with astrongDjango background will be considered.

Hiring Process:

  • Technical Round
  • HR Round
  • Discussion with Founders

Role Out:

  • Upon successful completion of the interview process, selected candidates will be offered a paid internshipforthe first month. Based on performance evaluation during the internship period, a full-time employment offerwillbe extended.

Benefits:

  • Opportunity to work with a diverse tech stack in a core data science startup environment.
  • Stakeholder benefits in our in-house projects.
  • Rapid career advancement and salary hikes based on performance.

Join us at xScientist and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of technology andinnovation!

career.title: UX Designer
career.shortDescription: UX Designer wanted to craft intuitive digital experiences. Strong skills in user research, wireframing, and prototyping. Join our team for impactful design projects.
career.jobDescription:
*Apply only if you have a strong hands-on practice with UX design principles.

Company Overview:

xScientist is a dynamic software and game development company based in India. Our primary missionis to empower entrepreneurs, engineers, and scientists to transform their innovative ideas into reality. Wespecialize in leveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver top-notch products and solutions. With a dedicatedteam of professionals, we offer a collaborative platform for individuals worldwide to participate in rapidproduct development. At xScientist, we are committed to excellence, utilizing the latest methodologies to ensureoptimal results for our clients.

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Conduct user research and gather insights to inform design decisions.
  • Create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups to visualize design concepts.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, developers, and product managers totranslate user needs into actionable design solutions.
  • Iterate on designs based on feedback and usability testing results.
  • Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in UX design.

Requirements:

  • Proficiency in UX design tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, etc.
  • Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and methodologies.
  • Experience with conducting user research, usability testing, and creating user personas.
  • Excellent visual design skills with an eye for typography, layout, and color.
  • Ability to communicate design ideas effectively and present findings to stakeholders.
  • Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or related field (preferred but notrequired).

Mode of Work:

Preference will be given to candidates willing to work on-site, but exceptional remote candidateswith a strong UI/UX background will be considered.

Hiring Process:

  • Portfolio Review
  • Design Challenge
  • Interview with Design Team
  • Discussion with Founders

Role Out:

  • Upon successful completion of the interview process, selected candidates will be offered a paidinternship for the first month. Based on performance evaluation during the internship period, a full-timeemployment offer will be extended.

Benefits:

  • Opportunity to work with a diverse community and startup environment.
  • Stakeholder benefits in our in-house projects.
  • Rapid career advancement and salary hikes based on performance.

Join us at xScientist and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to pushing the boundaries oftechnology and innovation!

career.title: ML Engineer.
career.shortDescription: Seeking ML Engineer to develop and deploy machine learning models. Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, and data processing required. Join our innovative team!
career.jobDescription:
*Apply only if you have a strong hands-on practice with machine learning algorithms and frameworks.

Company Overview:

  • xScientist is a dynamic software and game development company based in India. Our primary missionis to empower entrepreneurs, engineers, and scientists to transform their innovative ideas into reality. Wespecialize in leveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver top-notch products and solutions. With adedicatedteam of professionals, we offer a collaborative platform for individuals worldwide to participate in rapidproduct development. At xScientist, we are committed to excellence, utilizing the latest methodologies toensureoptimal results for our clients.

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Develop and deploy machine learning models for various applications such as recommendationsystems, natural language processing, computer vision, etc.
  • Collect, preprocess, and analyze data to train and evaluate models.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including data scientists, software engineers, andproduct managers to integrate machine learning solutions into products and services.
  • Stay updated on the latest advancements in machine learning research and implement bestpractices in model development and deployment.

Requirements:

  • Strong proficiency in Python programming language.
  • Experience with machine learning frameworks/libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn,etc.
  • Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms and methodologies.
  • Familiarity with data processing tools and techniques.
  • Proficiency in version control systems like Git.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field (preferredbut not required).

Mode of Work:

  • Preference will be given to candidates willing to work on-site, but exceptional remote candidateswith a strong Django background will be considered.

Hiring Process:

  • Technical Assessment
  • Technical Interview
  • Interview with Hiring Manager
  • Discussion with Founders

Role Out:

  • Upon successful completion of the interview process, selected candidates will be offered a paidinternship for the first month. Based on performance evaluation during the internship period, a full-timeemployment offer will be extended.

Benefits:

  • Opportunity to work with a diverse tech stack in a core AI and startup environment.
  • Stakeholder benefits in our in-house projects.
  • Rapid career advancement and salary hikes based on performance.

Join us at xScientist and be part of a dynamic team dedicated to pushing the boundaries oftechnology and innovation!

projects.Title: Newslix
projects.desc_1: Difficulty in accumulating historical news data due to complex website structures, paywalls, and IP blockers. Existing solutions often lack comprehensiveness, affordability, or user-friendliness. Inability to effectively analyze large datasets of historical news articles.
projects.desc_2: News Aggregation: Extracts news from thousands of sources in 34+ languages. Data Availability: Offers historical and current news data in JSON, CSV, and Excel formats. Advanced Analytics: Enables users to perform various data analysis tasks on historical and present news data.
projects.desc_3: Financial Analysis: Compare stock data with historical news articles to identify trends and forecast markets. Market Research: Gain insights from historical data to inform product launches and business strategies. AI & Machine Learning: Train machine learning models with a vast dataset of news articles to automate tasks and uncover opportunities.

projects.Title: Onclick
projects.desc_1: Extracting, processing, and managing images from public websites can be a time-consuming and cumbersome process. Manual methods involve navigating websites, inspecting code, and saving images one by one. This approach is inefficient and impractical for bulk image acquisition.
projects.desc_2: Effortless Image Extraction: Users simply paste a website URL and onclick automatically scans the HTML code, identifying and extracting all available images. Intuitive Management: Extracted images are categorized by type and resolution for easy exploration. Light and dark background options enhance image inspection. Seamless Downloading: Single images or entire selections can be downloaded individually or as a convenient ZIP archive.
projects.desc_3: Increased Efficiency: Save time and effort by automating image extraction and download tasks. Enhanced Workflow: Organize and explore discovered images with ease, streamlining creative and development processes.

projects.Title: Achive Info
projects.desc_1: Traditional social media platforms often connect users on a broad scale, neglecting the potential for local interactions. Additionally, privacy concerns arise when platforms require precise location data for connection.
projects.desc_2: Privacy-Preserving Proximity: Users connect with others nearby without revealing their exact location. Only usernames are displayed, fostering safe interactions. Customizable Profiles: Create a unique profile with optional details like names, photos, bio, and interests. Manage the visibility of each field for individual control. Hashtag-Driven Connections: Explore interests and intentions using hashtags. Find potential dates (#dating), job opportunities (#HiringCook), or people who share your language (#FrenchSpeaker) easily.
projects.desc_3: Enhanced Privacy: Interact with local users without compromising your precise location. Streamlined Networking: Connect with people at events, conferences, or social gatherings with ease.

projects.Title: Toaster InGame Notification System
projects.desc_1: Crafting eye-catching and functional in-game notification systems can be time-consuming for game developers. Traditional approaches often involve complex coding and customization, hindering workflow and delaying development cycles.
projects.desc_2: Effortless Integration: Seamlessly integrate Toaster into your projects with a single import and a few lines of code. No extensive codebases or custom systems required. Enhanced User Experience: Create engaging and informative popups that grab player attention without disrupting gameplay. Customization Freedom: Tailor notifications to your game's aesthetics with a range of customization options, including design, animation styles, and text formatting.
projects.desc_3: Enhanced Privacy: Interact with local users without compromising your precise location. Streamlined Networking: Connect with people at events, conferences, or social gatherings with ease.

projects.Title: DeePost
projects.desc_1: Traditional social media platforms often connect users on a broad scale, neglecting the potential for local interactions. Additionally, privacy concerns arise when platforms require precise location data for connection.
projects.desc_2: Privacy-Preserving Proximity: Users connect with others nearby without revealing their exact location. Only usernames are displayed, fostering safe interactions. Customizable Profiles: Create a unique profile with optional details like names, photos, bio, and interests. Manage the visibility of each field for individual control. Hashtag-Driven Connections: Explore interests and intentions using hashtags. Find potential dates (#dating), job opportunities (#HiringCook), or people who share your language (#FrenchSpeaker) easily.
projects.desc_3: Enhanced Privacy: Interact with local users without compromising your precise location. Streamlined Networking: Connect with people at events, conferences, or social gatherings with ease.

projects.Title: Nick's Property Finder
projects.desc_1: Finding the ideal property is challenging, browsing various dealer sites. Time-consuming, lacks effective filters, leading to frustration. Simplify search with precise criteria.
projects.desc_2: Nick's Property Finder addresses property search challenges through automated data collection from dealer websites via web scraping. It compiles a centralized database of flats, bungalows, plans, and apartments. Its key feature is a robust filtering system enabling users to refine searches by bedroom count, amenities, and budget. This ensures personalized property matches, enhancing the search experience by efficiently accommodating individual preferences and requirements for utmost satisfaction and convenience.
projects.desc_3: Nick's Property Finder streamlines property search by consolidating multiple sources, offering advanced filters, and ensuring a user-friendly experience, saving time and enhancing decision-making.

projects.Title: DHC Dashboard
projects.desc_1: Legal professionals, including judges and advocates, encounter challenges managing case details efficiently. Rising case volumes make manual handling cumbersome, leading to inefficiencies and potential errors.
projects.desc_2: The DHC Dashboard offers a comprehensive solution by providing a centralized platform for managing and organizing case details and documentation. Judges and advocates can easily upload case information, including documents and hearing dates, onto the platform. Through intuitive search and filter functionalities, users can swiftly locate specific case details based on their requirements. Additionally, the integration of an AI bot automates the process of analyzing case documents and providing feedback to user queries, further enhancing user experience and efficiency.
projects.desc_3: Efficiently manage cases with accuracy and accessibility. Automation reduces manual effort while enhancing decision-making, leading to cost savings and improved collaboration among legal professionals.

projects.Title: JSON to HTML
projects.desc_1: Organizations face challenges with PDF accessibility and usability. Despite portability and consistent formatting benefits, viewing, interacting, and extracting information can be cumbersome.
projects.desc_2: To address these challenges, we propose the development of a PDF to HTML Conversion API. This API will accept JSON data extracted from Adobe PDF files and seamlessly convert it into plain HTML format. Users can opt for Adobe CSS styles for consistent formatting or choose plain HTML for a lighter output. The API will offer a simple RESTful interface for easy integration into existing systems and workflows, allowing organizations to automate the conversion process and make PDF content more accessible and usable across various devices and platforms.
projects.desc_3: Convert PDFs to HTML for enhanced accessibility and usability. Automate the process for time and cost savings, while maintaining flexibility and seamless integration.

services.desc_1: Our Web Development Solutions encompass the creation of tailor-made websites that align with your business goals. Our team crafts unique designs, bringing them to life with full-stack development expertise.

services.desc_2: We specialize in mobile app development, creating engaging, user-friendly applications across platforms. From concept to execution, we prioritize intuitive interface design for lasting impact.

services.desc_3: Explore Interactive Game Development with our expert team mastering 2D and 3D This ensures personalized property matches, enhancing the search experience by efficiently accommodating individual preferences and requirements for utmost satisfaction and convenience.This ensures personalized property matches, enhancing the search experience by efficiently accommodating individual preferences and requirements for utmost satisfaction and convenience.

services.desc_4: Unlock AI and Machine Learning's potential with our specialized solutions, streamlining processes, enhancing decision-making, and improving user interactions through advanced neural network models.

services.desc_5: We specialize in extracting, transforming, and visualizing data, mining insights through advanced analytics techniques, ensuring clean data with insightful visualizations.

services.desc_6: For UI/UX design, we prioritize intuitive interfaces and seamless experiences. We leverage user insights to create engaging designs that enhance usability and drive satisfaction.
